Articles.Content: I do not have any pics yet, as I am on holiday in Italy, butI have a FAST helicopter design. First you just make a Heli however you want, there are a few designs out there, the place a propellor at the front. To take off, turn ASAS on then throttle up. Turn only the Heli unit on. Get to a hover then turn the propellor on, and you will go remarkably fast.

Anyone have any input?

Sort of difficult without any available visual measure.
Being a very hands-on, visual person, I\'d first need to see some images and maybe test-fly it.

Well I have a couple of designs on my home computer, but I\'ve been crossing continents for about five weeks. Basically just look up a Heli design, put a mk. 2 cockpit on the front then strap a damned aerospace rotor prop on the front.

Well I have a couple of designs on my home computer, but I\'ve been crossing continents for about five weeks. Basically just look up a Heli design, put a mk. 2 cockpit on the front then strap a damned aerospace rotor prop on the front.

You mean, sort of like a beanie hat with the propeller thing on top? I don\'t think such a mod exists...
It is just stock and damned aerospace, I think you are getting confused.
